claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

extracted_evidence.quote: Each 0.5 mL dose of Flublok may also contain residual amounts of baculo virus and Spodoptera frugiperda cell proteins (≤14.3 mcg), baculo virus and cellular DNA (≤10 ng), and Triton X-100 (≤100 mcg).
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote provides evidence that baculovirus and insect cell components are present in the final product, supporting the claim that Flublok is produced using a baculovirus expression vector system in insect cells.
